data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Can Necaxa capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leon's half?
In the minute 2, Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
Free kick for Leon in the half of Necaxa.
Throw-in Necaxa.
In the minute 6, It's a goal kick for the home team in Aguascalientes.
Claudio Baeza (Necaxa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 17, Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Victoria.
Corner awarded to Leon.
In the minute 23, Angel Mena for the away team is judged to be offside.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Leon.
In the minute 28, Leon have a goal kick.
Free kick Necaxa.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Necaxa.
In the minute 29, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Necaxa's Lucas Passerini gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Leon defender.
Leon needs to be cautious. Necaxa have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Can Necaxa capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 33, Free kick for Leon in the half of Necaxa.
Jose Cobian (Necaxa) gets a yellow card.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Necaxa a goal kick.
Necaxa drives forward and Ricardo Chavez gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 36, Free kick Leon.
A massive blow for Leon as Angel Mena misses from the spot.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Leon.
In the minute 42, Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead thanks to a penalty from Angel Mena.
In Aguascalientes Necaxa's Lucas Passerini is caught offside.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a throw-in for Necaxa, close to Leon's area.
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 44, Necaxa's Unai Bilbao has been booked in Aguascalientes.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Leon in the half of Necaxa.
In Aguascalientes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Necaxa to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
In the minute 45, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre blows to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Estadio Victoria.
Leon are pushing forward but Luis Montes's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 47, Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Victoria.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
In the minute 50, An attacking Leon player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
Julio Gonzalez (Necaxa) has received a yellow card from Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Angel Mena nets and Leon extend their lead to 0-2. The goal came from the penalty spot.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Free kick for Necaxa in the half of Leon.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a Necaxa throw-in in Leon's half.
In the minute 54, Ian Gonzalez for Necaxa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
In the minute 56, Ricardo Chavez of Necaxa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Necaxa close to the penalty box.
David Cabrera for Necaxa drives towards goal at Estadio Victoria. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 56, Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Leon a goal kick.
Necaxa have a goal kick.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 59, Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Necaxa in Aguascalientes.
Goal kick for Leon at Estadio Victoria.
In the minute 61, Corner awarded to Leon.
Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team replace Jose Cobian with Alex Zendejas.
In the minute 64, Maximiliano Salas is on a sub for Juan Delgado for Necaxa.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 65, Necaxa's Lucas Passerini gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Victoria. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
Throw-in for Leon in their own half.
In the minute 66, The away team have replaced Nicolas Sosa with Joel Campbell. This is the first substitution made today by Marcos Ignacio Ambriz.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 69, Necaxa's Maximiliano Salas gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Aguascalientes.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre awards Necaxa a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Leon.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 72, Necaxa are in shooting range from this free kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Leon goal kick.
Leon's Joel Campbell breaks free at Estadio Victoria. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 74, Necaxa have a goal kick.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a Leon throw-in in Necaxa's half.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Leon.
In the minute 76, Necaxa make their third substitution with Martin Barragan replacing Julio Gonzalez.
Claudio Baeza (Necaxa) has been sent off!
Marcos Ignacio Ambriz (Leon) is making a third substitution, with Jose Rodriguez replacing Jean Meneses.
In the minute 80, Marcos Ignacio Ambriz is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Victoria with David Ramirez replacing Angel Mena.
Free kick Necaxa.
Necaxa drive forward but Martin Barragan is judged offside.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Necaxa in the half of Leon.
Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre signals a free kick to Necaxa.
Necaxa's Ian Gonzalez misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 86, It's a goal kick for the away team in Aguascalientes.
Necaxa to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Necaxa close to the penalty box.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Luis Enrique Santander Aguirre.
In Aguascalientes Leon drive forward through Joel Campbell. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Full-time! The final score is 0-2.
